name: RUSSIA HORROR 20!8
detailed_description:
This game is in the horror,survival genre. The main meaning of the game is the disclosure of the main secret of the house in which our hero is located. In the game you have to find various items that will help to move forward on the plot. One of the advantages of the game is the possibility of choice, which will affect the plot. And as well as excellent music

RUSSIA HORROR 20!8, being a game that needs to be literally "to the touch", time after time coming to dead ends and replaying certain moments, not everyone will like. We play for John's boyfriend, who decided to find out what is in the house next door, but he does not yet know what awaits him there. He goes around the house and looks around, but death here usually comes abruptly and suddenly.



The game RUSSIA HORROR 20!8 is very mesmerizing. Everyone can experience the entire eeriness of this place. We are moving along dark locations, where you will experience unforgettable sensations. Various screamers and frightening sounds.
And get ready for the most shocking scenes that you've ever seen in video games. Playing on emotions, it will immerse you in an incomprehensible and misunderstood world, without giving a minute for a respite until the very end. If you think that I'm exaggerating her dignity, then try the game personally. And while I hide behind the sofa.

5000 achievements

And while I hide behind the sofa. I advise you to play in a dark room and at night. I'll see you in the RUSSIA HORROR 20!8.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel Core i7
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
